github_handle.description: The author's GitHub handle, used to create repository paths.

project_name.description: The plaintext name of the new project that will be templated.

project_slug.description: The slugified name of the new project that will be templated, used for the repository name.

_BRANCH_NAME_BASE.description: The name of the base branch that will be used in the templated repository.

_BRANCH_NAME_DEVELOPMENT.description: The name of the development branch that will be used in the templated repository.

_CONFIG_DEFAULT_SHFMT_OPTIONS.description: The CLI options that will be passed to shfmt in during precommit hook execution and CI/CD.

_CONFIG_DEFAULT_SHELLCHECK_OPTIONS.description: The CLI options that will be passed to shellcheck in during precommit hook execution and CI/CD.

_DOCKER_DEFAULT_CONTAINER.description: The container that will be used for the shellcheck, shfmt and other core binaries.

_GITHUB_ACTION_CACHE.description: The name and version of the GitHub Action used for caching.

_GITHUB_ACTION_CHECKOUT.description: The name and version of the GitHub Action used for checking out code.

_GITHUB_ACTION_MARKDOWN_LINK_CHECK.description: The name and version of the GitHub Action used for validating markdown links.

_GITHUB_ACTION_PYTHON.description: The name and version of the GitHub Action used for installing Python.

_GITHUB_ACTION_SCRIPT.description: The name and version of the GitHub Action used for running custom scripts.

_GITHUB_ACTION_TRUFFLEHOG.description: The name and version of the GitHub Action used for the trufflehog binary.

_GITHUB_CI_DEFAULT_CONCURRENCY.description: The default concurrency value that will be used for GitHub workflows.

_GITHUB_CI_DEFAULT_PYTHON_VERSIONS.description: The list of Python versions that will be used in GitHub workflows.

_GITHUB_CI_DEFAULT_VERBOSE_NOTIFICATIONS.description: The default verbosity of GitHub Action notifications.
